akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 90–448, title XVII, § 1719(b), Aug. 1, 1968, 82 Stat. 610

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1417. Repealed. Pub. L. 90–448, title XVII, § 1719(b), Aug. 1, 1968, 82 Stat. 610
Section, act Sept. 1, 1937, ch. 896, § 17, 50 Stat. 897, related to capital stock of the Authority.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Retirement of Capital StockPub. L. 90–448, title XVII, § 1719(b), Aug. 1, 1968, 82 Stat. 610, provided in part that the capital stock referred to in this section be retired and the sum of $1,000,000 represented by such stock returned to the Treasury of the United States.
